mutants.original_line: s1 = ''.join(e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum())).lower()

mutants.original_line: s2 = ''.join(e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum())).lower()
